knimeNode.name: Preset Date/Time
knimeNode.shortDescription: Presets date or time to timestamps lacking this information.

fullDescription.intro: Sets a default date or time to those timestamps where the date or time is not yet set.
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing date/time stamps.
Check and enter a date that should be set into those timestamps which do not have a date yet. If a date is already set it is not overwritten.
Check and enter a time to set this time into those timestamps which do not yet have a time set.
Check if missing values should be replaced with the entered date/time
